Personal Description

I possess a comprehensive two-year experience as a front-end developer, leveraging my prior background in UI/UX to assist clients in effectively conceptualizing abstract ideas across various media platforms, particularly in multimedia and interactive design.

My primary tools for constructing these ideas is ReactJS. However, I maintain an insatiable curiosity and continually seek to expand my knowledge further.

Currently, I am actively enhancing my proficiency in back-end programming while also pursuing in-depth learning about emerging new technologies such as the Metaverse and Blockchain. It is my aspiration to evolve into a proficient full-stack programmer.

Skill Package
